resources.string: Don’t have an account? Register now
Already have an account? Log In
By creating an account you agree to our terms and conditions
By creating an account you agree to our Terms and Conditions & Privacy Policy

AURAfit Terms and Conditions

(Updated on October 10, 2025)

Welcome to AURAfit, an AI and AR-based outfit recommendation and wardrobe management application developed by the AURAfit Team. By accessing or using AURAfit, you agree to these Terms and Conditions ("Terms"). Please read them carefully before using the app.

1. Acceptance of Terms

By creating an account or using AURAfit, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and any future updates. We may revise these Terms by posting an updated version on the app. Continued use after updates means acceptance of the revised Terms.

2. Description of Services

AURAfit offers the following key features:

• AI-powered outfit recommendations based on user wardrobe, preferences, occasion, and weather;

• AR-based virtual try-on and body measurement estimation;

• Digital wardrobe management for clothing and accessories;

• Community posting and social sharing of fashion content;

• Outfit reservation and event-based engagement features.

We may modify, add, or remove features as necessary to improve user experience.

3. Eligibility

You must be at least 13 years old to use AURAfit. If under 18, parental or guardian consent is required.

4. User Responsibilities

You agree to:

• Provide accurate and updated information upon registration.

• Keep login credentials confidential.

• Use the app for personal, non-commercial purposes.

• Follow community guidelines and avoid harmful or offensive posts.

• You are solely responsible for all activities under your account.

• Users must provide a valid and accurate email address. The app is not responsible for any issues caused by incorrect or invalid emails.

5. Prohibited Uses

Users agree not to:

• Upload or share unlawful, defamatory, or explicit content.

• Violate intellectual property rights of others.

• Attempt to hack, reverse-engineer, or disrupt AURAfit\'s systems.

• Use AURAfit for spam, advertising, or fraudulent activities.

• Misuse AR features or community tools in ways that harm others.

Violations may lead to suspension or permanent account termination.

6. Community Guidelines

By using AURAfit\'s community features, you agree to respect all members and avoid:

• Harassment, hate speech, discrimination, or bullying;

• Sharing explicit or offensive content;

• Impersonating other individuals or brands.

We reserve the right to remove any post or account that violates these guidelines.

7. Intellectual Property Rights

All app content, visuals, designs, software, and AI systems belong to AURAfit or its licensors. Users retain ownership of their uploaded photos or posts but grant AURAfit a limited, royalty-free license to display and share them within the app.

8. Disclaimer on AI Recommendations

AURAfit\'s outfit suggestions are generated through artificial intelligence for style inspiration only. We do not guarantee that suggested outfits will fit perfectly or align with every user\'s personal preference, style, or occasion.

9. Limitation of Liability

AURAfit is provided "as is" and "as available." We do not guarantee uninterrupted service or error-free performance. AURAfit and its developers are not liable for damages arising from:

• Service interruption or downtime;

• Inaccurate recommendations;

• Unauthorized account access beyond our control;

• Loss of user data due to technical failures.

10. Third-Party Services

AURAfit may integrate third-party APIs or tools (e.g., weather or authentication services). We are not responsible for their privacy practices or terms. Users are encouraged to review third-party policies before using such integrations.

11. Account Termination

We may suspend or terminate your account if you:

• Violate these Terms or the Privacy Policy;

• Use AURAfit for illegal or harmful activities;

• Provide false or misleading information.

You may delete your account anytime through settings. Your data will be deleted in accordance with the Privacy Policy.

12. Governing Law and Dispute Resolution

These Terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of the Philippines. Any dispute shall be resolved exclusively in the appropriate courts of [Jurisdiction].

13. Contact Us

If you have questions, suggestions, or complaints regarding these Terms or the app, please contact: aurafit0104@gmail.com

AURAfit Privacy Policy

(Updated on October 10, 2025)

AURAfit ("we," "us," or "our") values your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your data when you use our mobile application and related services.

By using AURAfit, you agree to the terms described in this Privacy Policy. Please read it carefully before continuing to use the app.

1. What Personal Information We Collect

When you use AURAfit, we may collect only the information necessary to provide you with a smooth and personalized experience.

1.1 Personal Information

We may collect:

• Full name or display name

• Email address

• Gender, age, and body measurements (except belly size, if unavailable)

• Uploaded wardrobe items (clothes, shoes, and accessories)

• Photos or AR scans for outfit visualization

• Account credentials and preferences

1.2 Device and Technical Data

To improve app performance and security, we may automatically collect:

• Device model, operating system, and app version

• IP address and general location (non-precise)

• Browser type (if using web version)

• Crash logs, analytics, and usage data

1.3 Optional and Community Data

If you engage with AURAfit\'s community features, we may also collect:

• Photos, captions, and comments you upload

• Messages or interactions with other users

We do not collect or store financial, SMS, or credit-related information.

2. How We Use Your Information

AURAfit uses your information solely for the following purposes:

• To create and manage your AURAfit account

• To generate AI-based outfit recommendations and style suggestions

• To enable AR-based body measurement and virtual try-ons

• To improve app features, usability, and personalization

• To facilitate community interaction, event participation, and reservations

• To send you important updates, reminders, or notifications

• To ensure user safety and prevent misuse or fraud

• To comply with legal and regulatory requirements

We do not sell, rent, or trade your data to any third party.

3. Third-Party Data Processing and Integrations

We may share your information with trusted service providers (e.g., cloud hosting, analytics) solely to support app functionality. All third-party processors are contractually obligated to maintain the same level of data protection as required under the Data Privacy Act of 2012 (R.A. 10173).

If you use third-party integrations (e.g., Google login or weather-based outfit suggestions), please review their respective privacy policies as AURAfit is not responsible for how those external systems handle data.

4. International Data Transfer

Your data may be processed and stored on servers located outside the Philippines. We ensure that such transfers comply with applicable data protection laws and maintain equivalent safeguards for your personal information.

5. Protection of Personal Information

We apply strict technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or loss. This includes encryption, access controls, regular security testing, and limited access for authorized personnel only.

However, please note that no system is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute data protection.

6. Data Retention and Deletion

We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes stated in this Policy or comply with legal obligations.

If you delete your account, your personal data will be permanently removed or anonymized within a reasonable period, unless longer retention is required by law.

7. Your Rights Under the Data Privacy Act

As a user, you have the right to:

• Access and obtain a copy of your personal information

• Correct or update inaccurate data

• Withdraw consent to data collection or processing

• Request the deletion or destruction of your personal data

• Object to data processing for specific purposes

• File a complaint with the National Privacy Commission (NPC) for violations of your rights

You can exercise these rights by contacting us at aurafit0104@gmail.com.

8. Children\'s Privacy

AURAfit is not intended for users under 13 years old. If we become aware that a child has registered or provided personal data without parental consent, we will promptly delete the information.

9. Cookies and Analytics

AURAfit uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance app performance and user experience. You may disable cookies in your device or browser settings, but some features may not function properly as a result.

10. Updates to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. The updated version will be posted within the app and will indicate the latest revision date. Continued use of AURAfit after any updates constitutes acceptance of the revised Policy.

11. Data Protection Officer (DPO)

AURAfit has appointed a Data Protection Officer to oversee compliance and handle privacy concerns. Email at aurafit0104@gmail.com, [Jurisdiction]

12. Consent and Acknowledgement

By creating an account or using AURAfit, you consent to the collection and processing of your data in accordance with this Privacy Policy. If you disagree, please refrain from using AURAfit and providing personal information.
Username must be at least 3 characters
Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
Please enter a valid email address
Password must be at least 8 characters
Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number
Please stand your whole body in the box, front view. Don\'t move for 5secs
Camera permission is required for body measurement. Please enable it in app settings.
Storage permission is required to upload photos. Please enable it in app settings.
Storage permission is optional but needed for photo upload
This app needs camera and storage permissions to function properly. Please enable them in Settings.
Step 1: Position yourself in the frame and capture
Would you like to save your measurements?
Please fill in all measurement fields
Please enter a valid height (100-250 cm)
Please enter a valid chest measurement (60-150 cm)
Please enter a valid shoe size (3-20)
What style or preferences would you like?
Please enter at least one field
Would you like to update body measurements?
